Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a singleton class that represents the database of the framework. It contains a method to update itself.
    Author:
    Albex
    See Also:
    updates(Stack)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        private Database()
        This the constructor of the class. It is private as it must not be called. Use the method getInstance() instead.
        See Also:
        getInstance()

      • Database

        private Database(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<Predicate>> initialDB,
        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Stack<Initiator>> initialInitiators,
        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Stack<Terminator>> initialTerminators)
        This the second constructor of the class that allows to initiate the database. It is private as it must not be called. Use the method getInstance(initialDB, initialInitiators, initialTerminators) instead.
        Parameters:
        initialDB - is the initial database.
        initialInitiators - contains all the initiators of the actions or events.
        initialTerminators - contains all the terminators of the actions or events.
        See Also:
        getInstance(HashMap, HashMap, HashMap)

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final Database getInstance()
        This is the method to get an instance of the class.
        Returns:
        the only instance of the class Database.

      • getInstance

        public static final Database getInstance(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<Predicate>> initialDB,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Stack<Initiator>> initialInitiators,
                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Stack<Terminator>> initialTerminators)
        This is the second method to get an instance of the class. It allows one to initiate all the attributes of the class.
        Parameters:
        initialDB - is the initial database.
        initialInitiators - contains all the initiators of the actions or events.
        initialTerminators - contains all the terminators of the actions or events.
        Returns:
        the only instance of the class Database.

      • printOut

        public final void printOut()
        This method display the state of the database in the console.

      • updates

        public void updates(java.util.Stack<Predicate> events)
        This is the method that updates the database when the step cycle asks so. This should be only used by a CycleState implementation.
        Parameters:
        events - the events that have been triggered during the previous cycle.
        See Also:
        DatabaseUpdateState
